# Experiment 1 - Motion

## Early

### First Years

```{r echo=FALSE}
source("dmc/dmc.R")
load_model("lba","lba_B.R")
load("data/derived/final_samples_exp1_firstyear_early.RData")
gelman.diag.dmc(converged_samples)
t(simplify2array(effectiveSize.dmc(converged_samples)))
plot.dmc(converged_samples,hyper=T)
```
